name: Board Life
description:
Board Life is a board-card game in which you spend or receive years of life in gaming events.

Controls:
 - Mouse - select cards, navigate through the menu, move the camera.
 - W A S D - alterative movement of the camera.
 - Q E - camera height

Features:
- The combination of board and card game
- 62 game event cards
- Realistic dices
- Random generation of the playing field
- Life is currency

The game is made:
- Serious07 - Team Leader, Code, Game Design, Texts
- Akagane - Models and Art
- Arthur Yul - Music and Sounds

Please do not forget to rate!
